numberWidget.number_of_transactions_with_success_stat: Number of transactions with success status
numberWidget.number_of_eoas_that_sent_at_least_1_tran: Number of EOAs that sent at least 1 transaction
numberWidget.number_of_addresses_that_participated_in: Number of addresses that participated in the blockchain
numberWidget.number_of_blocks_over_all_time: Number of blocks over all time

verifiedContracts.title: Verified contracts
verifiedContracts.searchPlaceholder: Search by contract name or address
verifiedContracts.noMatches: Couldn{{apos}}t find any contract that matches your query.

addressBlocksValidated.noValidatedBlocks: There are no validated blocks for this address.

blockDetails.blockHeightHint: The block height of a particular block is defined as the number of blocks preceding it in the blockchain
blockDetails.l1BlockHeightHint: The most recent L1 block height as of this L2 block
blockDetails.sizeHint: Size of the block in bytes
blockDetails.timestampHint: Date & time at which block was produced.
blockDetails.transactionsHint: The number of transactions in the block
blockDetails.withdrawalsHint: The number of beacon withdrawals in the block
blockDetails.statusHint: Status is the short interpretation of the batch lifecycle
blockDetails.validatedByHint: A block producer who successfully included the block onto the blockchain
blockDetails.commitmentTxHint: L1 transaction containing this batch commitment
blockDetails.confirmationTxHint: L1 transaction containing confirmation of this batch
blockDetails.blockRewardHint: For each block, the validator is rewarded with a finite amount of native token on top of the fees paid for all transactions in the block
blockDetails.gasUsedHint: The total gas amount used in the block and its percentage of gas filled in the block
blockDetails.gasLimitHint: Total gas limit provided by all transactions in the block
blockDetails.minimumGasPriceHint: The minimum gas price a transaction should have in order to be included in this block
blockDetails.baseFeePerGasHint: Minimum fee required per unit of gas. Fee adjusts based on network congestion
blockDetails.burntFeesHint: Amount of native token burned from transactions included in the block. Equals Block Base Fee per Gas * Gas Used
blockDetails.priorityFeeHint: User-defined tips sent to validator for transaction priority/inclusion
blockDetails.hashForMergedMiningHint: Merged-mining field: Rootstock block header hash
blockDetails.blockDifficultyHint: Block difficulty for validator, used to calibrate block generation time
blockDetails.totalDifficultyHint: Total difficulty of the chain until this block
blockDetails.blockHashHint: The SHA256 hash of the block
blockDetails.parentHashHint: The hash of the block from which this block was generated
blockDetails.sendCountHint: The cumulative number of L2 to L1 transactions as of this block
blockDetails.sendRootHint: The root of the Merkle accumulator representing all L2 to L1 transactions as of this block
blockDetails.delayedMessagesHint: The number of delayed L1 to L2 messages read as of this block
blockDetails.nonceHint: Block nonce is a value used during mining to demonstrate proof of work for a block

txInfo.transaction_hash_hint: Unique character string (TxID) assigned to every verified transaction
txInfo.status_and_method_hint: Current transaction state: Success, Failed (Error), or Pending (In Process)
txInfo.withdrawal_status_hint: Detailed status progress of the transaction
txInfo.confirmation_status_hint: Status of the transaction confirmation path to L1
txInfo.revert_reason_hint: The revert reason of the transaction
txInfo.timestamp_hint: Date & time of transaction inclusion, including length of time for confirmation
txInfo.execution_node_hint: Node that carried out the confidential computation
txInfo.from_hint: Address (external or contract) sending the transaction
txInfo.to_hint: Address (external or contract) receiving the transaction
txInfo.commitment_tx_hint: L1 transaction containing this batch commitment
txInfo.confirmation_tx_hint: L1 transaction containing confirmation of this batch
txInfo.value_hint: Value sent in the native token (and USD) if applicable
txInfo.poster_fee_hint: Fee paid to the poster for L1 resources
txInfo.network_fee_hint: Fee paid to the network for L2 resources
txInfo.gas_usage_limit_hint: Actual gas amount used by the transaction
txInfo.gas_used_for_l1_hint: L2 gas set aside for L1 data charges
txInfo.gas_used_for_l2_hint: L2 gas spent on L2 resources
txInfo.gas_fees_hint: Base Fee refers to the network Base Fee at the time of the block, while Max Fee & Max Priority Fee refer to the max amount a user is willing to pay for their tx & to give to the {{validatorTitle}} respectively.
txInfo.blob_gas_usage_hint: Amount of gas used by the blobs in this transaction
txInfo.blob_gas_fees_hint: Amount of {{currency}} used for blobs in this transaction
txInfo.raw_input_hint: Binary data included with the transaction. See logs tab for additional info.
txInfo.l1_fee_hint: L1 Data Fee which is used to cover the L1 'security' cost from the batch submission mechanism. In combination with L2 execution fee, L1 fee makes the total amount of fees that a transaction pays.
txInfo.l1_fee_scalar_hint: A Dynamic overhead (fee scalar) premium, which serves as a buffer in case L1 prices rapidly increase.

utils.block_producer_tooltip: A block producer who successfully included the block into the blockchain
utils.mint_burn_address_tooltip: Address used in tokens mintings and burnings

data_fetch_alert.description: Something went wrong. Try refreshing the page or come back later.

contractVerification.supported_methods: Currently, Blockscout supports {{count}} contract verification methods

addressNameInfo.contractNameHint: The name found in the source code of the Contract

addressDetails.creator: Creator
addressDetails.tokensHint: All tokens in the account and total value
addressDetails.netWorthHint: Total net worth in USD of all tokens for the address
addressDetails.transactionsHint: Number of transactions related to this address
addressDetails.transfersHint: Number of transfers to/from this address
addressDetails.blocksValidatedHint: Number of blocks validated by this validator
addressDetails.lastBalanceUpdateHint: Block number in which the address was updated

txDetailsGasPrice.hint: Price per unit of gas specified by the sender. Higher gas prices can prioritize transaction inclusion during times of high usage
txDetailsGasPrice.label: Gas price

txDetailsBurntFees.hint: Amount of {currency} burned for this transaction. Equals Block Base Fee per Gas * Gas Used{blobGasCondition}
txDetailsBurntFees.label: Burnt fees
